channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.description: Fifty-six percent of female founders say they see more opportunity because of AI.

item.title: The Abrahamic Covenant Is A Bad Argument For The U.S. Going To War With Iran
item.description: We shouldn't treat the Abrahamic covenant lightly, but neither should we cherry-pick it to haphazardly apply to a modern geopolitical map.
